A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No character development\, very crammed rushed script.  TFA wasnt great mainly due to being fairly unoriginal but it had more space and more human connection and emotion.  If TFA was a 7 out of 10\, I figured with all that was set up and the characters to work with TLJ should of topped Empire\, but this is a disaster.  The script made Finn and Poe seem like bad actors where in Force awakens they seemed pretty good.  This movie has no depth\, no real feeling. Oh well
